Suppliers

Discover the organisations we supplier with to drive sustainability, innovation, and growth across the space sector.

Green Orbit Digital collaborates with a wide range of strategic supplier organisations to promote sustainable practices and innovation in the space sector. These supplierships enable knowledge exchange, joint initiatives, and industry-wide impact.

Through our suppliers, we engage with leading research institutions, technology providers, advocacy groups, and international associations. Together, we advance solutions for environmental monitoring, space-enabled climate action, and responsible satellite operations.

These collaborations form the backbone of our ecosystem approach, ensuring that our projects are informed by expertise across multiple disciplines and regions.

Organisations

  • DOCK

    DOCK is a Leicester-based innovation hub providing office space, labs, and support for high-tech and low-carbon businesses.

    business serviceslocal

  • Ecosend

    Ecosend is an email marketing platform designed to minimise environmental impact, using carbon offsetting and energy-efficient infrastructure for sustainable digital communications.

    softwaresoftware

  • Krystal

    Krystal provides sustainable web hosting powered by renewable energy, combining high-performance services with a commitment to environmental responsibility.

    technologyweb hosting

  • Plusnet

    Plusnet is a UK-based broadband and telecommunications provider known for affordable services and customer-focused support.

    telecommunicationstelecoms

  • Stripe

    Stripe is a global payments platform that enables businesses to securely accept and manage online transactions while offering tools to support growth.

    financial servicespayments

  • Tide

    Tide is a UK-based digital banking platform offering accounts, payment services, and tools tailored for small businesses and entrepreneurs.

    financial servicesbank
